actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Enables the President or his designee to grant an exemption or realignment to a State, if a State, by proclamation of its Governor, makes a finding (that need not be prior to the effective date of the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973) that an exemption or realignment of time zone limits is necessary to avoid undue hardship or to conserve fuel in such State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973.
